# Ongoing Partner Reports

<br>

<center> Passwords for Reports are <a href="https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1p2v3f0DKqOoxLA5P6odgZWfPfJcjpFsM0FFKKkM8_fg/" target="_blank">here</a> which will only be viewable if you are a Teaching Lab employee. Different tabs within the spreadsheet contain the passwords for each year. </center>

<br>

```{r echo = F, layout = "l-page"}
library(bs4cards)
report_galleries <- tibble::tibble(
  location = c(
    "All Sites",
    "ABRSD",
    "Agawam",
    "Berkshire Hills",
    "Boston Prep",
    "Dennis-Yarmouth",
    "Greenfield",
    "King Phillip",
    "Milford",
    "Milton",
    "Needham",
    "Northampton",
    "Plainville",
    "Uxbridge",
    "Wakefield",
    "West Springfield"
  ),
  long_name = location,
  image_url = rep(c(
    here::here("Images/Reports/2022-2023/Ongoing/final_report_all_sites.png")
  ), 16),
  link = c(
    "Reports/2023Reports/Ongoing/final_report_all_sites.html",
    "Reports/2023Reports/Ongoing/final_report_abrsd.html",
    "Reports/2023Reports/Ongoing/final_report_agawam.html",
    "Reports/2023Reports/Ongoing/final_report_berkshire_hills.html",
    "Reports/2023Reports/Ongoing/final_report_boston_prep.html",
    "Reports/2023Reports/Ongoing/final_report_dennis_yarmouth.html",
    "Reports/2023Reports/Ongoing/final_report_greenfield.html",
    "Reports/2023Reports/Ongoing/final_report_king_phillip.html",
    "Reports/2023Reports/Ongoing/final_report_milford.html",
    "Reports/2023Reports/Ongoing/final_report_milton.html",
    "Reports/2023Reports/Ongoing/final_report_needham.html",
    "Reports/2023Reports/Ongoing/final_report_northampton.html",
    "Reports/2023Reports/Ongoing/final_report_plainville.html",
    "Reports/2023Reports/Ongoing/final_report_uxbridge.html",
    "Reports/2023Reports/Ongoing/final_report_wakefield.html",
    "Reports/2023Reports/Ongoing/final_report_west_springfield.html"
  )
)

report_galleries %>%
  cards(
    title = "Ongoing\nPartner\nReports",
    footer = long_name,
    link = link,
    image = image_url,
    width = 2,
    layout = "label-right",
    spacing = 3
  )
```
